Alarak.name: Alarak
Alarak.Description: A Tank who specializes against Mages thanks in part to his innate Spell Armor. 20 Spell Armor

AlarakDiscordStrike.name: Discord Strike
AlarakDiscordStrike.ShortTooltip: Damage and silence enemies in an area
AlarakDiscordStrike.FullTooltip: After a 0.5 second delay, enemies in front of Alarak take 175 damage and are silenced for 1.5 seconds.

AlarakSadismDummyUI.name: Sadism
AlarakSadismDummyUI.ShortTooltip: Alarak deals increased damage and has increased self-healing against enemy Heroes
AlarakSadismDummyUI.FullTooltip: Alarak's Ability damage and self-healing are increased by 100% against enemy Heroes. Repeatable Quest: Takedowns increase Sadism by 3%, up to 30%. Sadism gained from Takedowns is lost on death.

AlarakSustainingPower.name: Sustaining Power
AlarakSustainingPower.FullTooltip: Increase the healing received from damaging Heroes with Lightning Surge by 40%.

AlarakExtendedLightning.name: Extended Lightning
AlarakExtendedLightning.ShortTooltip: Quest: Reduce Sadism, empower Lightning Surge
AlarakExtendedLightning.FullTooltip: Reduce Sadism by 10%. Quest: Hit Heroes with the center of Lightning Surge. Reward: After hitting 5 Heroes, increase Lightning Surge's range by 20%. Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, Lightning Surge's center also Slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds. Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with the center of a single cast, increase Sadism by 10% and instantly gain all other Rewards.

Level4Talent.name: Level4Talent
Level4Talent.FullTooltip: Burrow to the target location, dealing 96 damage and briefly stunning enemies in a small area upon surfacing, slowing them by 25% for 2.5 seconds. Burrow Charge can be reactivated to surface early.

AlarakHeroicAbilityDeadlyCharge.name: Deadly Charge
AlarakHeroicAbilityDeadlyCharge.ShortTooltip: Channel to charge a long distance
AlarakHeroicAbilityDeadlyCharge.FullTooltip: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.6 seconds. Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

AlarakHeroicAbilityCounterStrike.name: Counter-Strike
AlarakHeroicAbilityCounterStrike.ShortTooltip: Prevents damage to deal damage in a large area
AlarakHeroicAbilityCounterStrike.FullTooltip: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 damage.

Alexstrasza.name: Alexstrasza
Alexstrasza.Description: A Healer who shares her Health with allies and can transform into a Dragon to empower her Abilities.
